description: There is sadness, determination and reflection as Brexit finally arrives, our Europe editor writes.
title: Brexit: End of era as EU says goodbye to UK
title_page: Brexit: End of era as EU says goodbye to UK - BBC News
maintext: Behind closed doors and away from gaze of the UK's more eurosceptic media, we were known for playing a big part in launching some of the bloc's most ambitious projects: the single market, the single currency (though we then opted not to join the euro) and the EU's enlargement eastwards.
